description: Please disregard the SAP Business Network posting response closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

### Title
RFSO Environmental Data Acquisition System

### Reference Number
WS3910774798-Doc4406910377

### Amendment Number and Date
0 (no amendments)

### Solicitation Number and Publication Date
WS3910774798, published on January 25, 2024

### Tender Closing Date and Time
February 22, 2024 at 14:00 EST

### Expected Contract Start and End Dates
July 31, 2023 and March 31, 2027, respectively

### Tender Status
Expired

### Details
Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment (NIB 41000000)

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Tender Type
Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

### Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and 15 other agreements.

### Regions of Opportunity
None specified

### Regions of Delivery
New Brunswick, Manitoba, Prince Edward Island, Northwest Territories, and other provinces and territories

### Requestor
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Requestor Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### End User
Department of the Environment (ECCC)

### End User Address
200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 4C6

### Contact Information
Luke Kenny, luke.kenny@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### URL and Attachments
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18621278?extsite=MTg2MjEyNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note address them with proper format, I assume? If so, the highest format repetition i've used is requested by the *-eng *"string. Here, I have also assumed deletion of trade agreements and none regions of opportunity.  Note also assignment of NIB and requestor to french isn't present above, those where only written for completeness.  

Please ensure this matches your request for format, do not show the input on first line. Ensure it is removed from the formatted document. 

I'm excited to present the rewritten document with precisely
